mapper.select: select p.per_code from sys_role r join sys_role_permission rp on r.id = rp.sys_role_id join sys_menu_permission mp on rp.sys_menu_has_sys_permission_id = mp.id join sys_menu m on mp.sys_menu_id = m.id join sys_permission p on mp.sys_permission_id = p.id where u.role_code = #{roleCode}
